org.openadaptor.legacy.convertor.dataobjects
Class LegacyUtils

java.lang.Object
  org.openadaptor.legacy.convertor.dataobjects.LegacyUtils
public class LegacyUtils
extends java.lang.Object

Utilities for conversion of legacy types.
These include DataObject, DataObject[] and DOXML.

Author:
higginse

asDataObjectArray

public static org.openadaptor.dataobjects.DataObject[] asDataObjectArray(java.lang.Object record)
                                                                  throws RecordFormatException
Box or cast supplied Object (DataObject, or DataObject[]) as DataObject[]

Returns:
the input record either cast to, or wrapped in, a DataObject[]
Throws:
RecordFormatException - if record is anything but DataObject or DataObject[]

getLegacyClass

public static java.lang.Class getLegacyClass(java.lang.String className)
Use reflection to derive legacy class.
Don't want to pollute openadaptor3 build with requirement for legacy jar. If it fails, it will just return null.

Parameters:
className -
Returns:
Class instance corresponding to supplied class name, or null if it could not be obtained.
